text: Pas, cun manosiki [haççi] xudro ʙa çoj ovarded, hamon guna, ki padaronatonro [ʙo faxru ƣurur] jod mekarded, ʙalki [ʙehtar va] ʙeştar az on Allohro jod kuned; va ʙarxe az mardum [kofirone] hastand, ki megūjand: "Parvardigoro, ʙa mo dar dunjo [molu farzand] ato kun". In şaxs dar oxirat ʙahrae [az ne'mathoi ilohī] nadorad
